name.vi: Giấy phép Công cộng Mozilla, phiên bản 1.1
name.ja: Mozilla Public License バージョン 1.1
name.zh-CN: Mozilla 公共许可协议，版本 1.1

release_notes.en-US: Remove Kickstarter campaign pop-up, since the campaign has succeeded and is almost over.

description.fr: Ce module complémentaire ne sera plus pris en charge lorsque Thunderbird 78 sortira d'ici quelques mois, à moins qu'un nombre suffisant de personnes s'engage pour soutenir la poursuite de la maintenance du module et la rende possible. Pour montrer votre soutien, rendez-vous sur la page https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/jik/rewritten-add-ons-for-mozilla-thunderbirds-next-release et contribuez. En bonus, les contributeurs Kickstarter de ce module et de mes autres modules complémentaires bénéficieront de ristournes significatives sur les licences des modules complémentaires. This add-on adds arrow buttons at the top of the folder pane which rotate back and forth through the various available folder views This add-on also causes Thunderbird to automatically switch to the "All Folders" view when you hover over the title above the folder tree for several seconds during a message drag & drop operation, and switch back automatically after the drop. In the add-on preferences, you can set the delay before the view is switched. Finally, in the add-on preferences, you can select which views are accessible in the pop-up menu at the top of the folder list, and of those, which show up when you rotate through the views using the arrow buttons. Compatibility notes: If you want to use this add-on with versions of Thunderbird prior to 49, you will need to download version 1.14. This older version does not have the ability to control which views are enabled. This add-on is incompatible with the "Maximize Message Pane" add-on.
description.en-US: This add-on will no longer be supported when Thunderbird 78 is released in a few months, unless enough people commit to supporting continued maintenance of the add-on to make it feasible. To show your commitment, please visit https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/jik/rewritten-add-ons-for-mozilla-thunderbirds-next-release and make a pledge. As a bonus, Kickstarter supporters of this and my other add-ons will receive significant discounts on add-on licenses. This add-on adds arrow buttons at the top of the folder pane which rotate back and forth through the various available folder views This add-on also causes Thunderbird to automatically switch to the "All Folders" view when you hover over the title above the folder tree for several seconds during a message drag & drop operation, and switch back automatically after the drop. In the add-on preferences, you can set the delay before the view is switched. Finally, in the add-on preferences, you can select which views are accessible in the pop-up menu at the top of the folder list, and of those, which show up when you rotate through the views using the arrow buttons. Compatibility notes: If you want to use this add-on with versions of Thunderbird prior to 49, you will need to download version 1.14. This older version does not have the ability to control which views are enabled. This add-on is incompatible with the "Maximize Message Pane" add-on.

summary.en-US: Folder view arrows; switch to "All Folders" view when hovering during drag & drop; allow user to select which views are enabled or tied to the view arrows.
